mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (boardId, postTitle, content, uuid) VALUES (#{boardId}, #{postTitle}, #{content}, #{uuid})
mapper.select: SELECT postId, postTitle, userName, content FROM post p JOIN user u ON p.uuid = u.uuid WHERE postId=#{postId};
mapper.update: UPDATE Post SET boardId = #{boardId}, postTitle = #{postTitle}, content=#{content} WHERE postId = #{postId};
